org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core

Class RAMDiskFileCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.config.AbstractConfigurationElement
      • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.AbstractFileCache
        • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.RAMDiskFileCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationElement, FileCache, org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.jmx.element.FileCacheMXBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class RAMDiskFileCache
extends org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.AbstractFileCache
    A file cache optimized to manage temporary files created on a RAM disk. If the RAM disk overflows, the implementation will spill over to a normal disk based file cache.

    • Nested Class Summary
